text: Yasiel Puig Valdés born December 7, 1990) is a Cuban professional baseball player. Puig plays for the Los Angeles Dodgers. Puig plays the position outfielder. Puig played for the Cuban national baseball team in the 2008 World Junior Baseball Championship. His team won a bronze medal. In 2012, he left Cuba and signed a contract with the Los Angeles Dodgers. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/community/miami- dade/article1963115.html - From Cuba to the majors: Yasiel Puig’s harrowing story Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Cuban baseball players
title: Yasiel Puig
